```{r}
simulated_all = rbind(generate_dataset(76, "mimic_76", 90000),
                      generate_dataset(77, "mimic_77", 60000), 
                      generate_dataset(78, "mimic_78", 30000))
ggplot(simulated_all, aes(x= monoisotopic_mass, y=apex_rt, color = RNA_name)) + 
  geom_point(size = 1, alpha = 0.5)
ggplot(simulated_all, aes(x= monoisotopic_mass, y=sum_intensity, color = RNA_name, group=interaction(RNA_name, ladder_type))) + 
  geom_point(size = 1, alpha = 0.5) +
  geom_line(alpha=0.3)
```
